A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I absolutely loved it. I think it's my favorite one out of the whole shebang. I say that with a bit of reservation because I've only seen it once but for now I think it is.
I went in with no expectations and no biases\, I just let them tell their story. What I saw was a wonderful and sometimes profound film about sacrifice. From the opening scene to the last\, it perfectly hit every note of what sacrifice means.
And it was damn pretty to look at.

I'm hearing that some people are really angry about it\, and these are real fans. That must really suck for them\, to be waiting for this movie all of this time and then they hate it.
I don't understand the anger\, but I'm not as attached to it as they might be. I love Star Wars but not enough to hate it.
- Justin 'MythTickle'
